name: Punch-Drunk
description:
You play as Johnny, a server at Phởlicious, a Vietnamese restaurant located in the heart of Orange County.   Fight against hooligans trying to destroy your workplace!!

Uses WASD controls.

Left-click to pick up and throw items.

Spacebar to jump.

Made for #PrecisionJam

Thanks Nina and Josh!! :)

A game by Jeff Huang (programming, additional art) and Toby Do (art, writing, level design, additional programming)

Music by Ryan Yoshikami

Title card design by Marley Townsend

Additional art by Anna Nguyen
